definitions.definition: A machine , building or company used for cutting ( milling ) lumber , or (rarely) other hard materials such as stone .
examples: He brought his portable sawmill and turned the old beams into interesting flooring.
The old sawmill still has its waterwheel but they took the saw away years ago.
The sawmill sells lumber to carpenters and sawdust to gardeners.

main_definition: A machine , building or company used for cutting ( milling ) lumber , or (rarely) other hard materials such as stone .
